name: ZombieWaveShooter
description:

Updates

Desc:

You are a soldier in a dream of you shooting about 1k zombies

Your objective is to kill and kill all of them 

You are a trained soldier and your head was hit by a big rock knocking you out maybe this dream has meanings or do it? maybe an upcoming game in the long future well we will never know until your children play one of our new games ;)
